Name: De Nieuwe Lelie
Review Text: Love this place. Been all around Amsterdam the last few days but we find ourselves coming back here the last couple of nights. Pool table on the bottom floor, nice bar in the middle with really friendly bar keepers, and space upstairs ‚Ä¶

Name: De Nieuwe Lelie
Review Text: A neighborhood spot where locals frequent. Though near a touristy part of Amsterdam, you will find more residents than tourists here. Good beer,  and if a football match is happening, it will be on the three small TVs above the bar. The ‚Ä¶

Name: De Nieuwe Lelie
Review Text: Very cozy with a nice atmosphere, laid back and friendly, some nice beers not the biggest selection compared to some more specialist places but still plenty. Well worth a visit

Name: De Nieuwe Lelie
Review Text: A lovely place to sit outside!

Name: De Nieuwe Lelie
Review Text: Beautiful, classic Amsterdam beer Cafe in the heart of one of Amsterdam's beautiful Jordaan. The area has become a bit more touristy and full of Air B&B's but the streets are still beautiful, and this is a great Cafe for a beer out front with a great view of the streets of Jordaan.

Name: De Nieuwe Lelie
Review Text: Beautiful outdoor dining on a quiet but great people watching corner. The food was delicious and the waitress was wonderful!

Name: De Nieuwe Lelie
Review Text: Nice little local pub. Friendly service, warm and comfortable.

Name: De Nieuwe Lelie
Review Text: My husband introduced me to this charming brown bar several years ago. This is his absolute favorite place in the Jordaan neighborhood to catch up with the friends he‚Äôs made there in the past 20 years. Now this has become my favorite place for many years!

Name: De Nieuwe Lelie
Review Text:
Nice place in a quite back street....
Good for a rest and "meditation"
Worth finding.

Name: De Nieuwe Lelie
Review Text: One of my favorite bar of Amsterdam. Quite small, a few outside tables (neighbors are not fond of noise though), a nice pool table inside, in a typical dutch decorum and in a super beautiful area of the city. Barmen here are always super chill and friendly.

Name: De Nieuwe Lelie
Review Text: A lovely atmosphere in this traditional authentic bar. Full of friendly locals and wonderful service from the bar staff. A great place to get off the beaten tourist track whilst being close to central Amsterdam.

Name: De Nieuwe Lelie
Review Text: Friendly bar. Classic Dutch buildings with high ceilings and two levels. If you want to have some fun there's a pool downstairs. There're no cats and the kitchen close at 10. Do ask for the cheese plane if you go after that, it's very flavory.

Name: De Nieuwe Lelie
Review Text: Fantastic pub. Vibrant yet cosy place to have a couple of good beers surrounded by Jordaan locals.

Name: De Nieuwe Lelie
Review Text: Nice for a bite, a beer, chilled and cozy.

Name: De Nieuwe Lelie
Review Text: Amazing host, fantastic beer and an unbeatable pub/cafe experience. Take the time to stop here if you find yourself in Amsterdam, a 4 euro beer and good company awaits.

Name: De Nieuwe Lelie
Review Text: Best brown bar in the Jordaan.

Name: De Nieuwe Lelie
Review Text: I truly enjoyed sitting here. We sat upstairs which gives you a lovely view over the bar. The bar lady was extremely nice and hospitable. Would definitely come back here.

Name: De Nieuwe Lelie
Review Text: Great beers and great atmosphere. Warm and cozy

Name: De Nieuwe Lelie
Review Text: Fantastic and super cozy cafe. Best coffee and beer are to be had here. They also have a pool table!

Name: De Nieuwe Lelie
Review Text: Cosy little Jordaan cafe with locals and tourists mingling in the warm ambiance

Name: De Nieuwe Lelie
Review Text: Slightly off the beaten track and a nice classic pub vibe.  Friendly to tourists even though it feels more like a local establishment.

Name: De Nieuwe Lelie
Review Text: Good beers, nice staff and friendly folk in the bar. You can play pool or cards and there are seats outside too

Name: De Nieuwe Lelie
Review Text: My friend spilt his beer on me and the floor and the bar owner rushed to clean it up and gave my friend a new beer free of charge, friendly place nice vibe good music and kind owner will defnitely recomend it to anyone!

Name: De Nieuwe Lelie
Review Text: it is a great little bar where you will feel really cozy, located in the corner, a very silent zone and the bartender is a very nice guy

Name: De Nieuwe Lelie
Review Text: Friendly staff, fine pints and generously portioned whiskeys. Sure what more could you want.

Name: De Nieuwe Lelie
Review Text: Great local bar near our air b'n'b. Friendly staff, good beer, warm welcome.

Name: De Nieuwe Lelie
Review Text: Top spot good beers cheap and pool table, a bit of sun at the end of the day if you're lucky, so please don't come people.

Name: De Nieuwe Lelie
Review Text: Really warm, cosy environment with fantastic service and tasty snacks. Would definitely recommend

Name: De Nieuwe Lelie
Review Text:
Great place, great owner and once again, thank you for another beer when I accidentally spilt mine on the floor and my friend :D
Gonna come back here over and over again

Name: De Nieuwe Lelie
Review Text: One of the best pubs there is. The stuff was great and the atmosphere was cozy and relaxing. Will totally visit it again.

Name: De Nieuwe Lelie
Review Text: Best brown bar in town. Super friendly owner and you‚Äôll get to hangout with the neighborhood crowd.

Name: De Nieuwe Lelie
Review Text: Don't tell it to others but by far one of the nicest places to have s quiet night cap on the terasse.

Name: De Nieuwe Lelie
Review Text: Friendly staff, cheapest beer we've found and a pool table. Lovely little bar in a lovely litter corner of town.

Name: De Nieuwe Lelie
Review Text: Relaxed and cozy, friendly place with locals and travellers. If you're lucky you get to hear some excellent (!!) whistling by one of the staff members.

Name: De Nieuwe Lelie
Review Text: Cosy real pub in Amsterdam!

Name: De Nieuwe Lelie
Review Text: Friendly, local, relaxed vibe. Great coffee :-) owner really nice chap.
